img.alt: The Warren “Chip” Johnson Community Service Award

a.span: The Warren “Chip” Johnson Community Service Award

div.p: The Warren “Chip” Johnson Community Service Award recognizes 8th grade students who demonstrate a commitment to their community through volunteer activities in the school as well as local organizations. Although the student must currently be in 8th grade, service performed during sixth and seventh grades will be considered. More than one individual may be nominated.

a.title: Go to comments for The Warren “Chip” Johnson Community Service Award

img.alt: Dr. Robert Langman selected as the next Superintendent of Schools

a.span: Dr. Robert Langman selected as the next Superintendent of Schools

div.p: Following a vote of the Board of Education, Darien School District #61 announces Dr. Robert Langman as the next Superintendent of Schools, effective July 1, 2020. Dr. Langman will replace Dr. Robert M. Carlo who is retiring at the end of the 2019 - 2020 school year.

a.title: Go to comments for Dr. Robert Langman selected as the next Superintendent of Schools
